title: IMMUNE Pure Essential Oil
description: Boost your defenses, naturally. Feel well with the power of plant medicine with this NATURAL REMEDY blend of 100% pure essential oils of Litsea Cubeba, Wild Ravensara & Eucalyptus Blue Mallee.. Inspiration: feeling healthy & full of vitality. Benefits: soothing & clarifying. Scent: herbal, citrus & cool
cleaned_text: No fillers, synthetic fragrances & always cruelty-free. Leaping Bunny Certified. Made in USA. FREE OF: synthetics, artificial fragrances, and dyes, parabens, sulfates, phthalates, PEG, GMO, mineral oil, formaldehyde, petroleum, and fillers. For external use only. Dilute before using topically.Avoid eyes. Keep out of reach of children. May irritate the skin. If pregnant, nursing, suffering from a medical condition, or taking medication, consult a physician before using. Best if used within 12-24 months of opening. Store in a cool, dark place for best results. Ingredients are subject to change based on component and natural ingredient availability. CAMPO products are not intended to diagnose, treat or prevent any disease, or affect the structure or function of the body. The information herein does not constitute medical advice. Anyone suffering from a medical condition should consult with a physician. User reviews do not constitute a guarantee that you will achieve the same results -- what works for one may not work for another.
